reviewText: Season 8, the final season of Rawhide, has only 13 episodes. This is  less than one-half the number of episodes in the the previous seven full seasons. Buyers should watch how Paramount prices this shortened final season. With Eric Fleming departed from the series, and an exorbitant price being charged for Season Seven, this should be only about $20-22.00 (based on all seasons). Thus three starts until the viewers know better,.
